list.name: Changes
list.comment: Removed the code that was handling subscriptions.

task.summary: Default task
Fixed magenta color.
Fixed magenta color.
Changed dropdown /select color in GUI from red to gray.
Added file logging to see why testbox was blank after running overnight.
Added splash screen with product name.
Added splash screen with product name.
Refactored main loop to consolidate message queue setup.
Changed dependency to always copy all files since it wasn't picking up changed files.
Deleted bitmap file.
Adding vertical scrolling for splash screen.
Adding vertical scrolling for splash screen.
Adding vertical scrolling for splash screen.
Moved lib into the src directory so that the live updating will catch new libraries.
Added src/lib to the path so that libraries will load.
Reduced bit depth to try and figure out cause of crashes.
Deleted duplicate wifimgr library.
Changed wifi logic to attempt a connection 4 times before telling the user to reset the wifi.
Added logic to retry connecting to wifi before every network attempt.
Added garbage collector call and error logging.
Last attempt didn't run because logging formatter was uncommented.
Updated libraries back for compiled 8.x.
Switched to CP 9.0,0 rc0 for testing. Moved ColorUtils to separate file.
Switched to CP 9.0,0 rc0 for testing. Moved ColorUtils to separate file.
Commented out explicitly running the garbage collector because it hangs the box.
Added timer to log error if queue-times API call or GC takes more than 2 seconds.
Added sleeps to wait time processing to try to get rid of hangs.
Moved the GC to the display loop.
When changing the domain name added in a wait and web server shutdown to settings update.
When changing the domain name added in a wait and web server shutdown to settings update.
Changed update logic to run synchronously with the scroller. Customers now see an updating message.
Tweaked the updating text.
Set the update time back to 10 minutes.
Added small delay after updating now message.
Turned off debug mode.
Added name of park before wait times.
Updated parsing to support parks with rides in lands and not in lands simultaneously. This was for the new Meet Beloved Disney Pals in EPCOT.
Updated vacation message to include special text for the same day.
Added an explicit file close when writing the secrets file, and added error logging to file to the wifimgr library.
Modified to allow external CSS file to make editing easier than modifying code.
Refactored Wifi manager to give more feedback when the password is wrong. Cleaned up the Wifi GUI to look more professional.
Fixed bug where it would reset the wifi password if the wifi network wasn't detected, as during a power outage.
Deleted imageload library because it caused a recursive stack overflow in the OTA updater.
Added stack traces and more description to exception handlers.
Added more robust error checking, wrote own ErrorHandler, checked for return HTTP status code on wwait update.
Added debug method that doesn't require an exception.
Added support for read-only file systems, when it prints to screen instead.
Changed to subscription model.
Cleaning up error messages that might fill up file system.
Removed the code that was handling subscriptions.

MESSAGE.value: Commented out explicitly running the garbage collector because it hangs the box.
Added timer to log error if queue-times API call or GC takes more than 2 seconds.
Added sleeps to wait time processing to try to get rid of hangs.
Moved the GC to the display loop.
When changing the domain name added in a wait and web server shutdown to settings update.
Changed update logic to run synchronously with the scroller. Customers now see an updating message.
Tweaked the updating text.
Set the update time back to 10 minutes.
Added small delay after updating now message.
Turned off debug mode.
Added name of park before wait times.
Updated parsing to support parks with rides in lands and not in lands simultaneously. This was for the new Meet Beloved Disney Pals in EPCOT.
Updated vacation message to include special text for the same day.
Added an explicit file close when writing the secrets file, and added error logging to file to the wifimgr library.
Modified to allow external CSS file to make editing easier than modifying code.
Refactored Wifi manager to give more feedback when the password is wrong. Cleaned up the Wifi GUI to look more professional.
Fixed bug where it would reset the wifi password if the wifi network wasn't detected, as during a power outage.
Deleted imageload library because it caused a recursive stack overflow in the OTA updater.
Added stack traces and more description to exception handlers.
Added more robust error checking, wrote own ErrorHandler, checked for return HTTP status code on wwait update.
Added debug method that doesn't require an exception.
Added support for read-only file systems, when it prints to screen instead.
Changed to subscription model.
Cleaning up error messages that might fill up file system.
Removed the code that was handling subscriptions.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Removed the code that was handling subscriptions.
